statements: DELETE FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE terrain_type = 'mountain' AND humidity < 40;
DELETE FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60;
DELETE FROM ARVRUsers WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_level < 3;
DELETE FROM VirtualWorldData WHERE terrain_type = 'forest' OR climate = 'mountain';
DELETE FROM VirtualObjects WHERE color = 'red' AND size > 10
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE environment_id IN (SELECT id FROM EnvironmentData WHERE temperature > 30)
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_type = 'Furniture' AND location_id IN (SELECT id FROM environment_data WHERE temperature < 20);
